Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from all of your current foes (or targets of your trickery), or use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf] to all your current foes (or targets of your trickery)

Losing sight of a trickster as talented as you for even an instant is the last mistake your foes will make. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 minute, even if you use a hostile action. Not even effects like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE] or see the unseen can reveal you, though creatures can still use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to locate you as normal.
